/* EXPERIMENTAL CODE - NON COMPILEABLE VERSION OF C++ */
/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

package example;

class Student
{
  private:

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Student Attributes
  String name;
  String studentNumber;

  //Helper Variables
  bool canSetName;
  bool canSetStudentNumber;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------
  public:

 Student::Student(String aName)
  {
    name = aName;
    canSetName = false;
    canSetStudentNumber = true;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  bool Student::setStudentNumber(String aStudentNumber)
  {
    bool wasSet = false;
    if (!canSetStudentNumber) { return false; }
    canSetStudentNumber = false;
    studentNumber = aStudentNumber;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;
  }

  String Student::getName()
  {
    return name;
  }

  String Student::getStudentNumber()
  {
    return studentNumber;
  }

  public void delete()
  {}

};
